pr_title: Fix span name populated by JAX-RS instrumentation

timeline.message: Fix span name populated by jaxrs instrumentation

timeline.bodyText: I think we have global unroll, so this is not needed
timeline.author: iNikem

replies.bodyText: AFAIR only HTTP client & server base test classes have @Unroll on them, every test that does not extend one of them still needs to use @Unroll
replies.author: mateuszrzeszutek
